website_summaries.verdict: The best budget keychain breathalyzer that focuses on accuracy more than fancy features.
pros: Simple design is extremely easy to set up and use
Large number readout is easy to read at night
The breathalyzer works quickly with minimal input
Key ring is solid and strong
cons: The battery can drain quickly if used several times in a row

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago and have tried using it numerous time along with my friends and it either reads .00 or .01 I have never seen it above that. Even when we had been drinking all night it said it was .00 Not worth the money, use your money and put it towards a more expensive one
customer_reviews.author: Sarah and Brock

customer_reviews.title: 000 and this thing is like 30.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has straight up saved my ass so many times I can't even tell you. Got pulled over last night, and I was confident I was way under the limit thanks to this little device. So far I and others have used it over 30 times and it seems to give really accurate, consistent readings. A Dui costs around 5,000 and this thing is like 30... Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Arjun Chakra

customer_reviews.title: Works just as advertised. I've used it and compared ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. I've used it and compared it to bar-top models and to other, bulkier models, and it seems just as accurate as long as you don't abuse it. Lots of other reviews are saying "I used this thing three times and now it keeps returning .00 no matter what, this thing sucks". That's what will happen if you don't want the 15 minutes between drinking and testing. Surprise surprise, if you blow pure alcohol onto the sensors for alcohol, you'll throw off the calibration a little bit. But follow the instructions, and this thing will do just what it claims to.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Grechis

customer_reviews.title: This is such a smart product to own
customer_reviews.text: This is such a smart product to own! We have experimented with it at home and at times when we felt fine to drive, we found out we were above the legal limit. Now we carry one with us and check ourselves anytime we have even one drink so we can make sure we are safe to drive. This could be a lifesaver! We've given them to friends for gifts. Everyone who drinks alcohol should own one.
customer_reviews.author: Gail P

customer_reviews.title: They work great but with some limitations
customer_reviews.text: They work great but with some limitations. The limitations such as you have to wait 20 minutes after you had drink. You cannot use immediately after smoking cigarettes, you cannot use this immediately after eating, requires special calibration after several months makes you wonder why you purchased it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Does not work and cannot be returned
customer_reviews.text: The item was defective upon arrival and confirmed after several tests. Blew 0.0 in each trial conducted by me and several others after a period of drinking. The only reading I have gotten on this device was a .01 after using mouthwash! The item is not returnable. I reviewed product details numerous time and did not see this disclaimer up front. However, when I contacted Amazon I did received full refund and was told that it was stated non-refundable in product details (still have not been able to locate where it says this in product description) but I did at least get my money back. Save yourself time and do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: LunaStar

customer_reviews.title: Great for DD to influence others not to drive after drinking.  Seeing those numbers is a sobering event!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work fairly well and the results are close to what one would calculate (body weight/consumption). You have to wait the specified time before testing (no consumption for at least 20 minutes) for it to work but it has settled some discussions and helped talk friends leaving a party out of driving so well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CashFlys

customer_reviews.title: For the Price, REALLY NICE
customer_reviews.text: This thing is cheap, but it is semi accurate. I did not do any side by side comparison to an actual breathalyzer, but if you listen to instructions and not be a goof, the reading can be trusted to within 0.01. I think this is a really good tool to check where you are when you want to go home at the end of the night, but I wouldn't use it as an alibi in court. TL;DR, if you want to check yourself out once in a while, good investment. If you're gonna go out with a group of lads and try to get a "high score" leave your keys at home and take a taxi.
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Cool device
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 21st birthday for fun and ended up being a hit with my friends who all like to try it out. Seems to be pretty accurate, just make sure not to blow into it right after taking a sip of alcohol or the BAC will read really high. You have to take a few minutes before testing it. Overall super fun and cool device to carry around when I go out drinking. It is also a good indicator when I'm feeling sober enough to drive but had a couple drinks and I want to double-check where I'm at, just to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Readings are extremely erratic
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed to see that the readings on this were so flexible. Sometimes, I'd have a single glass of wine over a two hour period, and it would read 0.08 (I weigh 156 lbs.) Other times, I'd feel a little tipsy after a glass and a half, and it read 0.03. It would be a great product if it were accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Product doesnt work. I was incoherent and I blew a 0.0.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Got it less than a month ago and at the beginning it worked fine but just now I tried to use it again and when i pressed the power button I heard the beep but nothing was displayed on the screen. I tried replacing the battery but still just the beep but nothing on the LED display to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Every friend group needs one of these
customer_reviews.text: We love this little guy. When we have people over to drink we make them use this before they drive home and it’s a great safe and honestly fun way to make sure everyone is good to go. Our friends love using it and always ask us to bring it when we go out. Please be cautious of the accuracy - you have to wait 20 minutes from your last drink OR rinse your mouth out in order to get an accurate number - if not the alcohol will be too strong on your breath and it won’t be accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Kharin Hanes

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, accurate and fun!  Great for parties!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute little product. It’s by a great company. This product is tiny and works very similar to a $75 professional one. By the same company. I compare the accuracy and it’s almost identical. Great for get togethers and parties!( when we are allowed to have them again in New York). Best tip is wait the 15-20 minutes since last food, drink and cigarettes to be accurate. The longer you wait the better it is.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Forest Hills

customer_reviews.title: It works for the most part. Reads high in ...
customer_reviews.text: It works for the most part. Reads high in my opinion and isn't entirely accurate, but does work relatively well. For the most accurate results you must wait before using and follow the instructions or you will get extremely high readings. If you want a legit close to 100% accuracte breathalyzer then this isn't for you. As a drinking gag with friends it gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: Leon Fickett

customer_reviews.title: Good for college kids, bad for saftey
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer was fun for college students for a couple of months. I'm not 100% sure that it was always correct, but it seemed to be very close to what BAC you really were. After a few months, the LED display started to go out. Overall, it was fun but not the best instrument. If you are using this to see if you can legally drive, I would give yourself a plus/minus tolerance of .02.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have had 3 shots of liquor and it still reading .00 I have tried it in between every shot exactly at 20 minutes This is a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: hercules0070

customer_reviews.title: Fails after drinking or eating
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a great way to ensure I'm compliant with minimum BAC levels when driving. However, I found out that you need to wait 20 minutes after eating or drinking for this thing to work. Sometimes, if there's food stuck in your teeth, you have to brush your teeth to get it to work. In general, I like having it when it works but, when it fails, it's quite annoying. Maybe a different breathalyzer works better than this one.
customer_reviews.author: ICanRead

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate or Consistant-Poor Quality-Not Reccommeded-Should Have Returned It
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy. Not accurate or consistant. Poor quality. Novelty item at it's best. I should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I’m writing this review because the bad ones are skewed in my opinion. I was hesitant to purchase because people said it’s not accurate and reads incorrectly a lot. From my personal experience, this breathalyzer is pretty dang accurate for how cheap it is but you have to FOLLOW DIRECTIONS. If you don’t wait 20 minutes after drinking or eating anything (even water), it will NOT read correctly. So follow directions and wait the 20 minutes and you’ll be golden! If you don’t wanna wait the 20 minutes, spend more money & buy a nicer one lol.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work and not eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK and this is not eligible for return! Do not waste your money. Believe me. I didn’t listen to the reviews I read. It gave me a BAC of 1.9 which is impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with this one...
customer_reviews.text: So upset thought this brand making more expensive ones was good however it blew .08 when I wasn’t even drinking... then .11 when I just had one sip of a mixed drink waited 3 min and blew a .11 don’t waste ya money. I just did and I did it to myself... I knew better and now here I am writing a bad review *heavy sigh...*
customer_reviews.author: Queens of Prime

customer_reviews.title: It’s either 0 or .08
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate as hell... I’ve tried and tried and after one sip or 20... it’s always 0 or .08. I didn’t realize .08 was all the higher it would read when I bought it. Then I thought maybe I WAS .08+ every time I’ve tried it.. then I dedicated a couple of efforts amongst friends... same thing. I’ve literally only seen two numbers on the screen. Huge disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Paityn

customer_reviews.title: Become the hit of the party
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. This is a must for any college partyer. My roommate and I went 50/50 on this (Yes, we are broke college students), and it was the best investment ever. Is it 100% accurate? No. But that's not what you're paying for. If you blow it 2 seconds after downing a shot of tequila you're going to blow like a .3 even if that's your first shot. It's to be expected with something of this price. However, if you follow the directions and wait 20 minutes after your last drink before using (alternatively, we'd wait about 5 and swish with OJ), the results are awesome. Plus, everyone at the party wants a try. Definitely worth the good times.
customer_reviews.author: Chad S.

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: Its not 100% accurate and the 15 minute wait is difficult to test. Bought it to stay safer when driving but I think I'm going to use it more as a drinking game with friends to see who can get the highest
customer_reviews.author: Connor Marchinetti

customer_reviews.title: Not at all accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all accurate. Errors out repeatedly and does not have accurate readings. Cannot reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Todd

customer_reviews.title: DOESNT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think my product works at all... I literally drank a full glass of port wine and then right after blowed into it and it said .00 and I know for a fact I have a blood alchohol content of Atleast.04 (at home of course with family) but still this product didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.author: Erikcliffor3

customer_reviews.title: Very very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, it works very well. I also decide to upgrade to a pro version, and again glad I did. It does helps you to make a wise choice before getting behind the wheel. this is a small cost investment, other then what of all the trouble a D.U.I. cost. and if you do bring it out on parties, people really want to try it, and see were they are, it also shows how responsible you are trying to be with yourself, and friends. If you are thinking about getting one, don't think, just do.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Used a couple times and it just doesn’t work anymore. It’s not out of battery either. It just says fail every single time I try to use it. Waste of money! Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it negative stars I would.. all it does is blow 0’s. Big waste of money with no customer service.. ive usually had good luck returning things that don’t work to amazon. But unfortunately not this time.. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: Shadow Green Lawn & Land

customer_reviews.title: This thing does not work. Do not buy it like I did.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is absolutely worthless. It registered zero after I absolutely deleted 8 beers in like an hour. I weigh 160 lbs. I was drunk. If you are trusting something like this to see if you can drive, you will most definitely end up killing a family of four. This company supports drunk driving, and the vehicular manslaughter of innocent children. Absolutely a waste of money, not worth a penny I paid for it. I tried to give it a zero star review but you cant on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Chugged 3 beers...still .00
customer_reviews.text: This product does NOT work at all. I received it in the mail and so I figured I’d put it to the test, so I slammed three beers , I couldn’t find the bottle of one for the picture and then o tried it out and it still read .00. I’m feelin’ a little hot now so there’s no way that that’s accurate. I don’t recommend this it will just get people into trouble thinking their good to go but they really aren’t.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Bramley

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I tested this and it's so not accurate at all. Waste of money. Not even remotely close to say it's off a little and you can guesstimate it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jr

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: Worth every Penney. I wanted to track my BAC to know when I'm not legal to drive and how long it takes to get sober. I've never gotten a .00, it just reads FL. But it's fast and consistent, small, and inexpensive. I like it. Update: I've used mine many times. I recently misplaced it, bought a much more expensive one, then found it and checked back to back. Mine is still accurate within .01 comparatively.
customer_reviews.author: Hotside

customer_reviews.title: Fragile / inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The product broke after I dropped it once. It still works, but the glass cracked. The product was very annoying to use since I had to keep blowing into the pipe because it wouldn't work. The product would sometimes show numbers above zero and sometimes zero, the product wasn't consistent. For the price I DON'T RECOMMEND IT.
customer_reviews.author: Yash Patel

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware. This DOES NOT work and you WILL NOT be able to return it. It is very inaccurate. I blew a supposed .12 fifteen minutes after drinking half of a hard seltzer. Then my husband blew .25 a half hour after one drink. The thing apparently just makes up numbers. And then you’re stuck with it because there’s no returns. Do yourself a favor and just don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I tend to believe for legal reasons, this meter might register a little higher than actual level, but I think it gives a fair representation.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate but works
customer_reviews.text: Not for accuracy but will tell if someone has been drinking or not and is convenient. If you need to have this on your keychain to see if you are just at .08 or not, I wouldn't trust it, and maybe you need to get serious treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Good product just a little on the expensive side
customer_reviews.text: I think this is pretty accurate and I really like using it. It is a little expensive but it gives you an axle rating not Just a pass or fail
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wiebe

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: works OK. had a glass of wine and was reading at a 0.10% so now sure if totally accurate but i guess i would rather it be over than under
customer_reviews.author: Chlsy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's a fun little toy for the money. It proved to be a little inaccurate. I wouldn't trust it outside of just using it for fun.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should - seems well calibrated. I've only used it about five times in the past few weeks but working as it should. Can't beat the price or the portability.
customer_reviews.author: Lindel

customer_reviews.title: Fun little toy to play with. Don’t know how accurate it is.
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% sure how accurate this is but seemed pretty good. Fun to play with while drinking with friends
customer_reviews.author: Lys

customer_reviews.title: A great accessory for any car!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing gadget! Very simple to use, and good fun. It's also a great conversation piece for your car when picking up a date... As far as I know, its fairly accurate. I haven't yet had the opportunity to compare results with the DUI patrols, but ill keep you posted. You do have to wait at least 20 mins for your last drink to get an accurate reading. Obviously taking a shot then taking a reading will give you well over 0.15.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Walker

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of GARBAGE. Following directions, you can blow in it and get a .00, and then 2 minutes later, get a 1.2 which is IMPOSSIBLE! Oh, and BY THE WAY, in case you didn't notice like me, you "can't" return this item, but I'm in the midst of trying anyway! DO NOT BUY!!! NO STARS IF POSSIBLE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE! Defective piece of junk. Reads zero after drinks. Zero with none. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mendes

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a month
customer_reviews.text: After about a month, the product just stopped working. The numbers are no longer showing up on the screen. I tried changing the battery but that didnt work. Overall, it was easy to use but the product stopped working after about a month, and it was too late to return. Wouldn't recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: andja

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work and is ineligible for return... what a ripoff. Just spend the extra $5 on an item that’s worth it
customer_reviews.author: Abigai

customer_reviews.title: This is a useless toy
customer_reviews.text: This product cannot give accurate readings (ever, even when working properly) and cannot be used within 20 minutes of eating, drinking or smoking without the risk of inaccurate readings and damage to sensor. This is a toy, plain and simple. Save your money and buy yourself another drink instead, cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Donovan M. Mochizuki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 21st birthday gift. Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Great 21st birthday gift. Small enough to keep in purse, on keychain or in vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Tdollar5

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work at all, save your money. You can't return it, and it just doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: For vegas
customer_reviews.text: Brought to Vegas with a group of friends. Also great to bring to the bar for that friend that never thinks they're "that drunk"
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hovey

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Literally does not work. So inaccurate. Brought to a party where we were all drinking and it registered 0.0 even when my friend was blacked out
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: seems to work. Easy to use and fits right on with my keys. I love it. Super handy
customer_reviews.author: BRITTANY D

customer_reviews.title: Nice but low battery life
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this thing, and its a great value for how inexpensive it is. My only complaint is that the batteries need to be changed every few weeks. Also, the accuracy is sometimes really off, but its typically pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brightman

customer_reviews.title: Cool and useful
customer_reviews.text: Fun conversation piece. Everyone is always amazed that I have one. It’s just fun and also Comes in handy in being responsible.
customer_reviews.author: david24

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time as described
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested it next to a alcosensor but it reacts to varying levels of alcohol
customer_reviews.author: WS94

customer_reviews.title: best $25 I've spent
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Bought one when I turned 21 to always double check myself or my driver when we go out, even if we're feeling okay. I found out that's it's accurate and reliable compared to a police breathalyzer (although theirs goes to three thousandths) mine read .03 and the police's read .035. I've had to replace the battery fairly often (a little more often than I think I should have), but eh. The only downside is that I've had the key chain break in two places two different times now. I got mine on sale through a groupon, but I'd still be overly satisfied with this if I had paid full price.
customer_reviews.author: n6lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun product!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun party trick. It does what it says it should do. We did compare this to a real sized breathalyzer and it was slightly off. Nothing too much to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: Blake J.

customer_reviews.title: total impulse buy and well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: although i don't think this thing is absolutely accurate i never leave home with it. its a big hit at the bar and also it lets me know the ball park figure im in so i don't drive drunk. for instance, if i blow a .08 ill wait another 30 mins and blow into again and make sure im at least .06 according to the device because then i know im good to drive. trust me its well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: phillylicious

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate. Listerine tricks it.
customer_reviews.text: I blew a 1.6 after using listerine and my wife accused me of getting hammered. Our counselor suggested we get this to. Needless to say things aren’t going well. Spend more money on a legit one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is nice to have. I bring mine everywhere just for the heck of it. Me and my boyfriend decided to try it one night and we just took turns blowing into it as we drank through the night. We made a game out of it.
customer_reviews.author: MorganAshley

customer_reviews.title: Sweet device
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Not pleased that it must be sent in for re-calibration at a hefty cost but there doesn't seem to be anything can be done about that - it's just the nature of the science behind the device. Still, I wish it wasn't so much much to calibrate.
customer_reviews.author: kerry

customer_reviews.title: Get 2 at least.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful in determining you BAC. The only issue is I bought 3 to make sure and 1 is way more sensitive then the other 2. I use this one to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Broke after the 6th-7th use. It no longer reads and just beeps after turning it on.
customer_reviews.author: Mojave760

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it but wanted a second one for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a much more expensive BACtrack a couple years ago. Very happy with it but wanted a second one for my purse. You get what you pay for. This one seems to work fine but pieces of the unit fell off as soon as I took it out of the package. Had to use tape to get to to stay on. We'll see how long this last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd One Didn't Work Either
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought registered .02 every time we tried it. No one, (including my 4 year old) had consumed any alcohol. When we did consume alcohol (not the 4yr old lol) it never changed off .02. Amazon would not accept a return on it when trying online. This was a first to me. But when I spoke to a real representative of Amazon, she had me keep this one and sent another free of charge. The second one would not change off .00. 10 shots? Nope you're good to go... Our drunken soberness became a joke throughout the evening. So a definite DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: ALLISON

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a a good/fun thing to have around. So far after multiple attempts on many different occasions I have never received anything other than an error message. Results always the same FL. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Thrown in the trash after purchasing two units and both misreading. Useless to say the least.
customer_reviews.text: Thoroughly read, reviewed, and followed instructions, however- the read is never accurate. Do not recommend for anyone. Purchased two and just threw them in the trash. If you are looking for a reliable & accurate read, DO NOT purchase this. Do not understand why this is even available to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JGuerra

customer_reviews.title: Handy.
customer_reviews.text: Has not let me down. I have an interlock and have to taste and spit wine at work. I get nervous and this puts me at ease.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Dyer

customer_reviews.title: may the fourth be with you!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this by "accident" on June 28. Came in today, expected date of delivery, and my boyfriend and I are both very impressed! It's a bit hard to hear the beeping but it really does work as intended. The manual even informs you about the dangers of alcohol on your body and gives you a chart on how you'll be feeling at different percentages. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase, I may need to get a few more for Christmas presents (LOL).
customer_reviews.author: kristen curley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Indispensible for a night out if you've actually taken your car in the first place! Drive safe.
customer_reviews.author: David Stuart McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. But, it feels light weight and cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Highly Evolved

customer_reviews.title: never worked want to return it
customer_reviews.text: didn't ever work would like to send it back and get one that works
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but does not seem to be accurate
customer_reviews.author: jayme

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't work at all. Despite the six Shots that I had within 2 or so hours, I blew a .02. Completely inaccurate. I threw away the box and everything, so it's too late for me to send it back to get my money back. Such a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrak

customer_reviews.title: Don't drive lol
customer_reviews.text: Straight out of the box, not a drink .02 3 24oz later .00 next attempt 6 pack .00 next no booze .00 the following attempt almost polished off a fifth .00 time and time again
customer_reviews.author: Eric Simon

customer_reviews.title: I think it was accurate? I brought it to ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it was accurate? I brought it to a bachelor party. Turned into a "who's the drunkest?" competition at the hotel. I lost it. Don't remember much else. Don't drink and drive.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Skip This Product, Grade: F
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t get the results I wanted. Wasn’t easy to use because the directions weren’t very clear. And I’m pretty sure the BAC readings weren’t accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Battyanyi

customer_reviews.title: Well worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We bring it out at parties and take it with when ever we will be drinking. It has stopped many drivers that thought they could get behind a wheel, make a wise choice.
customer_reviews.author: reimnbaker

customer_reviews.title: The price is pretty cheap which is nice
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how accurate this is, however I've played around with it sober and under the influence and the number so seem to be semi reflective of what state I believe to be in. The price is pretty cheap which is nice, but I have used any different ones to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Lucio

customer_reviews.title: Fun at parties
customer_reviews.text: Just pass it around. Whoever blows the least, has to drink!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Borzecki

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money; Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU ARE NOT LOOKING FOR A NOVELTY TOY. Absolutely does not give anywhere even near semi-accurate results. This will give “results” when you’re not even blowing into it. Worst part is, I spent real money on this and can’t return it. Waste of time, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bet your license on it.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and a compact package, battery had expired prior to opening the packing but the unit still functioned. Seemed accurate up to ~.08, beyond that it would only read at a .1% level and no higher regardless of breath alcohol content level. I had intended to compare side by side with a more expensive breath test but did not have the opportunity to do so. Perhaps at a later date.
customer_reviews.author: gunmetalgreen

customer_reviews.title: Does not give accurate reading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have some inclination of a reading. I took one sip, waited and drank a sip of water and blew ( .14) had three beers, drank some water still the reading was (.14) not pleased with item. I also bought three of them, two for friends and they are useless - unable to return.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: A+ I bought this for my boys. They got ...
customer_reviews.text: A+ I bought this for my boys. They got a kick out of it. It actually does work really well!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: This device will blow .01 or .02 BAC while stone cold sober. Don’t know if it’s the calibration or what. I have another breathalyzer that isn’t key chain sized that works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to girls weekend fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take in a girls weekend. We used it for entertainment purposes only. I did notice that you had to wait at lest 5 minutes after taking a drink to get an accurate reading.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly w.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price In gauging my level outing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it 8 or 10 times. Good for the price In gauging my level outing to outing. I believe the lower levels are "higher" readings and the higher level readings may be "lower" . Just my opiion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, inexpensive, and seems to work well. Not the highest precision, and I wouldn't drive if it it said I was close to the legal limit, but good to get a sense of how your body processes alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Rones

customer_reviews.title: Neat unit
customer_reviews.text: I'm no cop or BAC expert, but this little device appears to be fairly accurate. Its VERY finicky and hard to learn to use, and there is EXTREME emphasis on NOT drinking for 20mins before taking your BAC level... it will play funny tricks on it (ie not scanning your bac, or scanning too high, or erroring out). Overall, it seems accurate enough to trust it that it wont let my BAC be over what is says.
customer_reviews.author: Matter

customer_reviews.title: SCAM DONT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Item doesn’t work and there is no option to return
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: If you drink and plan on driving at some point be sure your not going to get a dui or hurt some one. This is cheap and easy to carry. Tells you your blood alcohol level before you hop behind the wheel. Way cheaper than a DUI or accident. Think before you drive.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Malinoski

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and realized it was reading completely sober people with .2 readings. Followed every instruction and still didn’t trust the product. It’s small and cheap. Makes sense that it wouldnt work forever.
customer_reviews.author: Keeley

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for awareness
customer_reviews.text: This little thing defintely makes you think twice about driving drunk. I use it more so for a general guage of my alcohol levels and never trust it to be exact. It does however seem to give about the same reading if you blow a few times in a row. So I would assume it's somewhat accurate or atleast consistant. Either way, It's a fun toy for a party and strikes up good conversation. Also helps to prevent a DUI or if you just want to prove who's drunker!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Buy one
customer_reviews.text: It can be an enlightening view into the practical reality of the alcohol levels enforced in each state. Might save someones life through education.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: I've kept one in my purse for 2-3 years now and still works great.
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me when i had the interlock in my car. I'd blow and if it was a .02, i'd wait about an hour and to the hour i'd blow again, it would be .00 and i'd be safe to drive. I've kept one in my purse for 2-3 years now and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best investments I've made - I blow after a drink to make sure that I am under the legal limit to drive... good practice to avoid a DUI, which can cost thousands and thousands of dollars! Very happy with this purchase and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to double check if I should go blow or skip as part of my probation. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Check yourself out before leaving the restaurant/bar/party.
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool and works great. It's small enough to be discreet if you don't want everyone you're with to know you're checking. I've had mine for 3 months now and felt I should use it about 4 times. Cool to see when you're over (or close to) 0.08, which is the Texas limit. Seriously is peace of mind for me when I'm just not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Chris in TX

product_meta.title: BACtrack Keychain Breathalyzer Portable Keyring Breath Alcohol Tester, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe BACtrack Keychain Breathalyzer is a revolutionary portable breathalyzer that takes size and portability to the next level. The BACtrack Keychain Breathalyzer is a fully functional breath alcohol tester with an internal alcohol sensor, folding breath tube, and even optional mouthpieces. You can quickly and easily estimate your BAC, Blood Alcohol Content, by blowing through the mouthpiece for 5 seconds. Never before has a breathalyzer had accurate alcohol sensing technology in a design this small and affordable. You can take the product everywhere and test yourself, friends, family, or anyone who is curious about their Blood Alcohol Content. The innovative folding mouthpiece pulls out during testing and slides back down during storage – it’s that easy! Everyone will want to test themselves whether you’re at a party, bar, restaurant, or anywhere else alcohol is consumed. Learn how drinking alcohol affects your Blood Alcohol Content and always make smart, informed decisions. And you can trust the BACtrack Keychain Breathalyzer because of BACtrack’s history and experience with personal and professional alcohol breathalyzers.
feature_bullets: Advanced MicroCheck Sensor Technology - BACtrack's proprietary sensor technology delivers reliable, accurate BAC results you can trust.
Ultra-Compact Design - Fits inside a purse or pocket and can be easily used as a keychain. Warm-up time is 11-13 seconds. Battery life is approximately 150 tests
Effective Breath Capture - The innovative fold-out mouthpiece ensures only your breath goes into the breathalyzer, while ambient air, fumes, and other airborne gases are kept out.
One Touch Operation - Simply power on your BACtrack Keychain and BAC results are displayed on a bright, easy-to-read LCD display in seconds

Manufactured by BACtrack - The #1 most-trusted brand of breathalyzers, with over 14 years of experience providing the most accurate, convenient and affordable breath alcohol testing devices on the market

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
